# 04.06.18

* agreed on 12 questions (see XXX file)
* we have to still think about how to determine the anchors
* we will randomize the order of the questions as well as the anchors (in total every participant will receive 6 high and 6 low anchors)
* main hypothesis (confirmatory): If a low anchor is given the estimates will be significantly lower than the estimates following a high anchor (dependent variable: estimate, independent variable: low/high anchor resulting in two dependent groups)
additional hypothesis(exploratory): participant who know about the anchor effect will be less influenced by the anchor than participants who don't know about it (dependent variable: influence of anchor(anchor index), independent variable: knowledge about anchor effect(yes, no) resulting in two independent groups)
